name: FluorescenceInSituHybridizationFISHTestForAcuteLeukemia
title: Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization FISH Test for Acute Leukemia
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a laboratory test for FISH (fluorescence in situ hybridization) for acute leukemia.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with FISH testing for acute leukemia using blood, tissue, or bone marrow samples.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes FISH testing not typically performed for acute leukemia diagnostics.)
